Summary: triangular object, very bright lights, low to ground, circled around field, moved across driveway and dissappeared - took a picture
divs: sighting detailswe live in a rural community and have a long ��� mile gravel driveway with a large field along the whole right hand side of the driveway. my three children (ages 3, 7, and 11) and i turned into the driveway and had stopped at the mailbox, which is towards the beginning of the driveway, to get the mail when we saw some extremely bright lights at the far end of the field. it lit the far end of the field up as if it were a football\baseball field. there were no beams of light, it was just ommitted from the lights on the craft. i got out of the car and noticed it was moving slowly in a circular path. it was triangular in shape, with 3 extremely bright white lights at each corner. the edges of the craft glowed with a dull, yet still bright, silvery light. it reminded me of the neon lights you see under cars. in the center was an extremely large red light that was noticable but it did not appear to cast color around it or on the craft itself. the craft appeared to be a dull silver\gray in color but i could not really get a good look at the color due to the bright lights. it began to move slowly across the field and over the far opposite end of my driveway. i grabbed my phone out of my seat and quickly took a picture as it passed over the woods on the left side of the driveway. after about 45 seconds from when we first saw it and about 5-10 seconds after i took the picture it disappeared. it did not shoot off, or leave any trails of light because of moving quickly, and did not go behind any hills or trees (there was nothing to obstruct the view). it simple just disappeared. my two oldest could verify the exact experience to my husband when we got to our house a few seconds later, so i know what we saw. hopefully, when i download my picture to my computer at home tonight i will be able to zoom in and have it enhanced to better make out the objects shape. right now, the picture looks like a massively bright glowing object\ball, and you can see some metal at the edges of the light. as soon as i have the picture i will email it to your sight asap.
